title: Review requirements for mvp-2-create-loop-layered-tracks
response:
Feedback Summary (2 comments):

General Comments:
1. When recording a new track to overdub onto one or more existing tracks that already form a loop, the metronome must not be activated.
2. When recording a new track to overdub onto one or more existing tracks that already form a loop, the specification allows recording of the new track to begin simply by pressing the key corresponding to the sample, without needing to press the space bar.
